thread.title: Michelle Obama Shares Vintage POTUS Pic For Father's Day
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama Shares Vintage POTUS Pic For Father's Day

author: The Huffington Post News Team
title: Michelle Obama Shares Vintage POTUS Pic For Father's Day
text:
Michelle Obama wished the president a Happy Father's Day the same way basically everyone else on Instagram did: with a throwback photo ! The vintage image shows President Barack Obama at the beach with daughters Sasha and Malia. 
"Thinking today and every day about the father of these two. Happy Father's Day!" Michelle Obama wrote. 
Check it out: A photo posted by First Lady Michelle Obama (@michelleobama) on Jun 21, 2015 at 7:04am PDT 
The Obamas sure do love throwback pics! More:
